sense.def:
Kdor je
noble
, je pošten, pogumen in nesebičen ter zasluži občudovanje in spoštovanje.

seg.quote: Among them were some of the greatest and noblest men in our history.
She had nobly served the cause of Christianity.

sense.def:
Človek, ki je
noble
, pripada visokemu družbenemu sloju in ima plemiški naziv.

seg.quote: Every noble in the land wanted to marry the king's daughter.

sense.def:
Kar je
noble
, naredi močan vtis zaradi svojih lastnosti ali videza.

seg.quote: ...an old man with a noble head and a bristling moustache.
